name: Firey's Basics Reimagined (Baldi's Basics Full Game Demo Mod)
name_original: Firey's Basics Reimagined (Baldi's Basics Full Game Demo Mod)
description:
Firey's Basics was an old mod from KwysockiPRO3 witch was a 1.3.2 mod. But This time I Rebooted it into a Full Game Public Demo Mod! I will also reboot the field trip too.

Story: Firey has opened a school place called "Firey's School of The Idiots" and you collect books yada yada blah blah blah yap yap yap blah blah you get the gist of it.

Charcters:

Firey (Baldi)
Principal Garfoogle (Principal of the Thing)
Ice Cube (Playtime)

Iec Man (It's a Bully)

The Sweeping Time Trio (Gotta Sweep)

Melon Cube (Arts and Crafters)
